description: Sick of Makeup Wipe Chemicals Irritating Your Skin? Transform Your Daily Routine the All Natural Way

Specifically designed for all skin types and made using 100% natural cellulose, this bulk 40-pack of cellulose face sponges is the perfect alternative to chemical-ridden, environmentally harmful makeup wipes and pads.
Fully Biodegradable & Each Pad Reusable for Up to 2 Weeks!

Providing a refreshing take on the facial cleansing process, each cellulose sponge within this pack is fully reusable – meaning you no longer have to throw away disposable makeup wipes and pads each time you use them
Better still, these cellulose sponges are biodegradable. So, when you’re ready to move on to your next sponge after 2 weeks of use, the environment will certainly thank you for it.

When paired with a makeup remover or your daily cleanser, you can achieve multiple skincare benefits with just one sponge. Able to remove makeup and dirt whilst gently exfoliating dead skin cells, you’ll be left with deeply cleansed pores for an instant soft, radiant look.
Gentle enough even for sensitive skin, this bulk pack is ideal for the whole family to use – both morning and night as part of your regular skincare routine.
Easy to Use & Perfect for Travel!

To release the full potential of these sponges, simply add water and watch them expand to their full size! Able to be massaged across the entire face with ease, the compact size of these sponges makes them perfect for use on-the-go when traveling.
Satisfaction Guaranteed – Or ALL Your Money Back
Whilst we’re certain you’ll love this 40-pack of cellulose facial sponges, if you’re not satisfied simply let us know within the first 30 days of purchase to receive a full refund.
Take Care of Your Skin with All Natural Quality – Get Your Cellulose Sponges Today!
